title: AM62x Sitara-based SoM with Linux support
description: The i.Core AM62x by ENGICAM is an embedded system module powered by the low-cost Texas Instrument’s AM62x Sitara processors . It is designed to be versatile, suitable for various applications that require 3D graphics acceleration, dual GbE interfaces and high-performing memory capacity. The heart of the i.Core AM62x is the TI AM62x Sitara processor with […]
